name: Paperwork.
description:
GameDev.tv gamejam 2022 submission.

Feedback is very welcome and appreciated!

My first attempt at dialogue/visual novels.

Made with love <3

All assets are my own except for the audio and the added fonts which are creative commons as per the game jam regulations.

Source: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/19bHUPFL7630NuMhxixShwhpMf_RMguEN?usp=sha... Credits: Fonts:

Rich Eatin': https://fontlibrary.org/en/font/rich-eatin
